keyPolicies.policyDescription: TAHIR MAHER is against a Hard Brexit and is presumably advocating for softer Brexit terms or against Brexit altogether.
TAHIR MAHER is taking a stand to support and protect the National Health Service.
TAHIR MAHER opposes cuts to school funding and is likely advocating for increased investment in education.

issues.brexitEurope: TAHIR MAHER is fighting against Hard Brexit.
issues.education: TAHIR MAHER is opposing school cuts.
issues.health: TAHIR MAHER is standing up for the NHS.

contactInformation.address: 10 Rhuddlan Close, Shenley Church End, Milton Keynes, MK5 6EL

images.caption: TAHIR MAHER with supporters in front of Blackberry Court, Health Centre

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains election communication details and the printing information, indicating it is official campaign material.
